answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Hi Chris,
I don't see a group called "Membership Access," but we do have groups that are restricted to ICMA members. Since you are an ICMA member, all you need to do is click on the "Join this group" option in the menu on the upper right of the screen on the group page. If I'm missing something, please send me the link to the group you are asking about.
Best regards,

author: Christopher Mobley
text:
Hello, 
I would like to join this group.  Please let me know the process for joining.  
Thank you. 
Chris Mobley
title: Membership Access
